definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: With the Mimosa Large hobo you can switch from a shoulder bag to cross-body in seconds.
sentences.chinese: 隨着含羞草大流浪漢可以切換橫身在幾秒鐘內從肩袋。

sentences.english: WANT to set down some general remarks about tramps .
sentences.chinese: 就流浪漢問題，我想談幾點粗略的看法。

sentences.english: There's homeless people around Yale and New Haven.
sentences.chinese: 耶魯和紐黑文附近有流浪漢。

sentences.english: Fuck the squeegee men dirtying up the clean windshield of my car.
sentences.chinese: 該死的那個弄髒我車窗的流浪漢。

sentences.english: Small-town girl meets mysterious drifter boy, they fall in love.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮的女孩，男孩遇到神祕流浪漢，他們墜入愛河。

sentences.english: How does a stroller's dress and hairdo become fashionable?
sentences.chinese: 一個流浪漢的衣着和髮型怎麼成潮流的？

sentences.english: For the past seven year, he lived the life of a drifter.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的七年中他過著流浪漢的生活。

sentences.english: We often speak of tramps with contempt and put them in the same class as beggars
sentences.chinese: 說起流浪漢，我們常常帶着輕蔑。

sentences.english: Santa is also known as the Swag Man.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕老人被認爲是流浪漢。

sentences.english: A woman pushes a stroller down the sidewalk in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 我們前面的一位婦女將一名流浪漢推倒在人行道上。

sentences.english: Sitting around the house day like a bum does nothing.
sentences.chinese: 像一個流浪漢一樣坐在房子周圍，一天什麼都不做。

sentences.english: Tramps seem to be the only exception to this general rule.
sentences.chinese: 對於這條定律，流浪漢可能是唯一的例外。

sentences.english: The tramp Charlie falls in love with a blind girl selling flowers on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 流浪漢差利愛上了一位在街頭賣花的盲女。

sentences.english: A homeless guy was sleeping on the sidewalk and wearing a Chinese school uniform.
sentences.chinese: 穿着校服的流浪漢躺在人行道上，華強北，深圳。

sentences.english: The tramp was arraigned on a charge of stealing.
sentences.chinese: 那流浪漢被指控有偷竊嫌疑而受到傳訊。

sentences.english: Homeless people in Dundee are being offered free vet care for their dogs.
sentences.chinese: 在鄧迪，流浪漢的狗總是得到免費的獸醫護理。

definition: to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to cause trouble/to create a disturbance
top of streets, bottom of alleys (idiom); everywhere in the city
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
at a loss to know what to do (idiom); bewildered
